name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Los Angeles International Airport
address: 6151 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Daily Mandatory Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: LA Hotel Worker Protection Ordinance Fee. Homewood Suites by Hilton LAX Airport is only five minutes from the terminals at LAX, accessible via complimentary airport shuttle which runs 24/7. Please inquire about shuttle service to concerts and football games. Whether you're in LA on business or just visiting, start off each day with a free hot breakfast. Each suite features a full kitchen, 1 king or 2 queen beds, work desk, and sofa bed. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Soak up the California sun at our outdoor pool or get a workout in at our fitness center. Planning a business meeting or social event? Our hotel features flexible meeting space for up to 40 guests.Hilton

name: Le Parc at Melrose
address: 733 North West Knoll Drive, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Discover an urban oasis and ultimate relaxation at this luxury boutique hotel, located in the heart of West Hollywood city center. Enjoy elegant amenities and state-of-the-art facilities, seconds from the action of the city. Le Parc at Melrose features numerous modern amenities and facilities. Guests can experience the beautiful city from the hotel's roof, equipped with tennis courts, a swimming pool and a sun deck. Accessible rooms are also available upon request. Only steps from Le Parc's front doors are many of the area's most famous attractions. Enjoy luxury shopping on Rodeo Drive, dine at legendary restaurants, or discover the vibrant nightlife of Santa Monica Boulevard.

name: W Hollywood
address: 6250 Hollywood Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90028
description: From start to finish, you'll be amazed by W Hollywood. Our hotel in Hollywood, CA, sits right on the lively streets of Hollywood Blvd and puts you at the center of top attractions like Hollywood Pantages Theatre, Hollywood Walk of Fame and the Capitol Records Building. With various eclectic event venues, West Hollywood will be the perfect backdrop for your next social gathering. You'll never have to wander far for good grub with our selection of American cuisine offered at Delphine Eatery and Station Hollywood - two of West Hollywood's finest restaurants in our hotel. The WET Deck is the ideal spot to make a splash in our rooftop pool after a workout in our hotel's fitness center. After an adventurous day, wind down in your hotel suite showcasing rich wood floors and fresh white linens accented with vibrant colors throughout the space. The views of the city lights from any part of our Hollywood Blvd hotel captivate the essence of W Hollywood.Marriott

name: Residence Inn Los Angeles Lax/Manhattan Beach
address: 1700 North Sepulveda Boulevard, Manhattan Beach, CA 90266
description: Let the Residence Inn Los Angeles LAX/Manhattan Beach be your home away from home! Conveniently located in a residential area of Manhattan Beach, CA, 4 miles from LAX Airport and 1 mile from Manhattan Beach Pier, our condo/apartment style hotel provides comfortable accommodations for those traveling on vacation or for work for an extended period of time. Experience spacious suites with fully equipped kitchens all the comforts of home and cost-saving amenities. Take advantage of our free grocery shopping services so you can focus on work or relaxing. Keep connected with free Wi-Fi access and enjoy your flat-screen TV. Additional hotel amenities outdoor BBQ areas and a fire pit, as well as a pool, and a fitness center.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Chatsworth
address: 20524 West Lassen Street, Los Angeles, CA 91311
description: Travel like you live at the Residence Inn by Marriott Chatsworth - San Fernando Valley's newest all-suite hotel. We are conveniently situated near highways 118, 405, 101 and minutes from CSU Northridge. Explore the great outdoors with the city's ample hiking trails, horseback riding areas, historical sites, and wildlife viewings. We are also near various film studios & some of LA's best sites. Our all-suite hotel has the comforts of home including a fully furnished kitchen which includes a cook top, dishwasher, cookware and dishware. Our spacious suites also include separate living, working and sleeping areas to help you create room for possibility. Kick back and socialize in our outdoor spaces which include fire pit seating to warm up and wind down or cook up a storm with our BBQ grill. Fuel your day with free breakfast - with a variety of healthy and hot options. Stay up to speed with our free Wi-Fi and smart TVs in every guest room, equipped with streaming apps. Make it yours at Residence Inn Chatsworth.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Marina del Rey
address: 4360 Via Marina, Los Angeles, CA 90292
description: Connected to a Courtyard® hotel, the all-new Residence Inn Marina del Rey offers a unique experience in Marina del Rey, California. Whether you're in Marina del Rey for a few days, a few weeks or a few months, your daily routine matters. Spacious studios and one-bedroom hotel suites with separate living and sleeping areas offer a comfortable home away from home. name: Sunset Marquis
address: 1200 Alta Loma Road, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: The Sunset Marquis Hotel Los Angeles is located in the heart of West Hollywood. Hidden away in a tree lined cul-de-sac, it is just steps from the famed sidewalks of the Sunset Strip in West Hollywood. The property features 2 outdoor pools and an on-site restaurant. Villas at the property include unique amenities like private elevators, kitchens,dining rooms, televisions, and living rooms. Suites include similar amenities with toiletries and Bluetooth enabled mobile speakers. There is an on-site bar available at the hotel. There is also a fitness center and spa available on-site. Guests can enjoy the gardens and 24-hour front desk. The property also is home to successful recording studios and an art gallery. The Sunset Strip is less than 0.6 mi from the property, while the Farmer's Market Los Angeles is 1.7 mi away. Dolby Theater and the Hollywood Walk of Fame are 2.3 mi away. Los Angeles International Airport is 12 mi from the property.

name: Residence Inn Los Angeles Torrance/Redondo Beach
address: 3701 Torrance Boulevard, Torrance, CA 90503
description: Experience a refreshing stay at Residence Inn Los Angeles Torrance/Redondo Beach. Conveniently located near the Palos Verdes Peninsula and 9.9 miles from Los Angeles International Airport, our extended-stay hotel in Torrance, California, offers access to more than 30 miles of hiking trails at Palos Verdes Nature Preserve with views of the Pacific. Visit Disneyland® and Del Amo Fashion Center®, as well as the shorelines of Redondo Beach Pier, Torrance Beach, Hermosa Beach and Manhattan Beach. Relax in our spacious suites featuring fully equipped kitchens, complimentary Wi-Fi and ergonomic workstations. Wake up refreshed and enjoy our complimentary breakfast buffet before heading out. Maintain your exercise routine using our 24-hour fitness center, and swim in our sparkling outdoor pool. If you are traveling with a group for business or leisure, take advantage of our special rates for room blocks. You'll feel at home in California while staying at Residence Inn Los Angeles Torrance/Redondo Beach.Marriott

name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Los Angeles LAX/Hawthorne

description: Refresh your travel routine when you stay at the TownePlace Suites Los Angeles LAX Hawthorne. name: Springhill Suites Los Angeles Lax/Manhattan Beach

description: Unwind at SpringHill Suites Los Angeles LAX/Manhattan Beach. Utilize our three venues for your flawless business meeting or gathering in California. name: Towneplace Suites Los Angeles Lax/Manhattan Beach
address: 14400 Aviation Boulevard, Hawthorne, CA 90250
description: Whether you’re in Southern California for work or fun, you’re in for a great stay at TownePlace Suites Los Angeles LAX/Manhattan Beach. name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles Redondo Beach
address: 2420 Marine Avenue, Redondo Beach, CA 90278
description: Settle in for a short or extended stay at The newly renovated Residence Inn Los Angeles Redondo Beach. Our modern hotel is located in Redondo Beach, CA near LAX Airport, Interstate 405, and the Green Metro Line station. Find all the comforts of home in our extended stay apartment-style suites with full kitchens, separate rooms and free high-speed Wi-Fi. Maintain your fitness routine at our fitness center and make a splash in our outdoor pool. Our complimentary breakfast will give you a jump on the day ahead. Offices for Aerospace Corporation, Northrop Grumman Space Park, Boeing, and lots more are within stone's throw. Here for leisure also? Easily get to Redondo Beach Pier, Hermosa Beach Pier, retail therapy at South Bay Galleria, and Seaside Lagoon. name: Residence Inn By Marriott Los Angeles Lax/Century Boulevard
address: 5933 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: The Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles LAX/Century Blvd boasts the largest guest suites near Los Angeles International Airport. All Suites are well-appointed with a sofa bed, plus a complete kitchen with microwave, full-size fridge, stovetop, dishwasher, and all related cookware. Standard complimentary amenities include a hot breakfast each morning, Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel, 24-hour shuttle to/from LAX airport running every 25-35 minutes (available on the upper level of LAX), outdoor heated pool, and fitness center. We have three onsite restaurants: Starbucks, Jersey Mike's, and ZPizza and Tap Room. Attend concerts and professional sporting events at venues such as SoFi Stadium and The Forum as well as downtown's Staples Center and Microsoft Theatre. Inquire about shuttle service to concerts and football games. If business brings you to L.A; our Residence Inn is convenient to El Segundo, Manhattan Beach, Marina del Rey, and the greater Hollywood Area and Entertainment Capital of the World!Marriott

name: Montrose at Beverly Hills
address: 900 Hammond Street, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Montrose at Beverly Hills is located in a quiet West Hollywood neighborhood, just 0.5 mi from the famous Sunset Strip. The hotel offers a rooftop pool terrace with a pool, a tennis court, and cabanas. An on-site restaurant is also available. All rooms and suites at The Montrose feature an HDTV, a fireplace, a hairdryer, a refrigerator, and a fully stocked mini-bar. Most suites include a balcony and some offer a kitchenette. Accessible rooms are available upon request. Rooftop poolside dining is also available for those looking to eat a lighter meal outside. Other rooftop amenities include a full seasonal bar that overlooks Hollywood and a regulation-sized tennis court. Guests can also enjoy a welcome beverage, two complimentary bottles of welcome water, morning coffee & tea, and a fitness center. Notable venues such as Whiskey A Go Go, The Roxy Theater, & Soho House are within 10 minutes’ walk from the property. Rodeo Drive & Beverly Hills are 5 minutes’ drive away.

name: The Sea View Inn At The Beach
address: 3400 Highland Avenue, Manhattan Beach, CA 90266
description: Located in Manhattan Beach, a 2-minute walk from Manhattan Beach, The Sea View Inn At The Beach provides accommodations with free bikes, private parking and an outdoor swimming pool. Located around a 12-minute walk from El Segundo Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.5 miles away from Dockweiler State Beach. Some units at the property feature a patio with a sea view. At the hotel, each room has a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all guest rooms at The Sea View Inn At The Beach have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The Sea View Inn At The Beach has a sun terrace. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Manhattan Beach, like cycling. Hermosa Beach is 1.7 miles from The Sea View Inn At The Beach, while Venice Beach Boardwalk is 9.5 miles away. The nearest airport is Los Angeles International Airport, 3.1 miles from the accommodation.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles LAX/El Segundo
address: 2135 East El Segundo Boulevard, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Minutes from Toyota Sports Performance Center, Manhattan Beach, Sofi Stadium, Redondo Beach Performing Arts, and YouTube Theater, the Residence Inn Los Angeles El Segundo invites you to thrive at our hotel near LAX Airport. Our studio, one-, and two-bedroom suites – some with ovens and fireplaces – feature free high-speed Wi-Fi, free hot breakfast, and separate living and sleeping areas with well-lit desks and fully equipped kitchens. Enjoy our outdoor pool and 24-hour fitness center. As one of the most convenient hotels near Sofi Stadium, we’re your gateway to LA beach areas, Marina del Rey, and Malibu. Business or pleasure trips to El Segundo and Manhattan Beach are convenient, as we are close to many companies, including Raytheon, General Dynamics, Northrop Grumman, Chevron, Aerospace Corp, Xerox, SAIC, Mattel, Boeing, Accenture, Sketchers USA, and Oracle. We also offer smal, modern El Segundo meeting rooms. Make your extended stay an exceptional experience, at our Los Angeles airport hotel.Marriott

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Los Angeles International Airport South
address: 1440 East Imperial Avenue, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Experience the Finest of California and LAX Hotels LAX hotels come no finer than the Embassy Suites Los Angeles - International Airport/South Hotel, located just two miles from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) in the quiet community of El Segundo, CA, home to numerous Fortune 500 companies and the heart of Southern California's aerospace community. Guests at our hotel stay in spacious two-room suites and receive a delicious free made-to-order breakfast each morning and hosted beverages and snacks every evening at our Evening Reception. The Embassy Suites - LAX South is ideal for a Southern California vacation with a wide array of local beaches in the surrounding communities: Manhattan Beach, Marina Del Rey, Redondo Beach, Venice Beach, Santa Monica, home of the Third Street Promenade. This all-suite Los Angeles hotel is just minutes from the Los Angeles Air Force Base, as well as the campus of Loyola Marymount University. The Embassy Suites - LAX South is one of the premier Los Angeles vacation hotels with wonderful amenities and an endless variety of surrounding tourist attractions, making this hotel perfect for southern California family vacations! This Los Angeles hotel offers high-speed Internet access throughout, as well as an on-site ATM. A lush tropical atrium and Koi fish, ducks, and turtles in gently flowing waterscapes, combined with the Mediterranean-style architecture, provide the perfect setting for a relaxing LA visit. 1440 bistro & bar, a contemporary twist on American fare, is located in the Embassy Suites Los Angeles - International Airport/South hotel. The lounge features a wide variety of spirits and wine, televisions with sporting events, and a pool table. This Los Angeles hotel is also ideal for business travelers, with its proximity to Los Angeles International Airport, Internet access throughout, and 11 meeting spaces. These spaces can be easily converted for a Southern California wedding, reception, and other special events. In order to stand out among other El Segundo hotels, we offer prime California accommodations with its convenient locale and extensive amenities. Visit one of the exciting Los Angeles tourist attractions in the area: Chinatown, Downtown Los Angeles, Rodeo Drive in Beverly Hills, The Fashion District of Los Angeles, The Hollywood Walk of Fame, The Los Angeles County Museum of Art, The Paul Getty Museum, The Queen Mary in Long Beach, The Staples Center - home of professional basketball teams, and Universal Studios. The Embassy Suites Hotel Los Angeles - International Airport/South invites you to indulge in this upscale, full-service hotel and all of the extensive services and amenities provided. Make your reservations now to ensure secure online booking at our Best Available Rate, or take advantage of the terrific Southern California vacation deals of our LAX hotel!Hilton

name: JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 900 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience a new level of luxury at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Offering an unbeatable location in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, only steps away from the excitement of L.A. LIVE, the Convention Center, Peacock Theatre and Crypto.com Arena, our hotel is ideally suited for both business and leisure travelers. Our hotel rooms and suites feature luxury bedding, a flat-screen TV, an ergonomic workspace and a marble bathroom, and many rooms offer magnificent downtown views. Savor fresh local fare at our on-site restaurants, pamper yourself at our spa or relax by our sparkling outdoor pool. Those seeking a remarkable destination for a business or social event in downtown Los Angeles can take advantage of 135,000 square feet of versatile, contemporary venue space, as well as knowledgeable planning and catering teams. Along with placing you moments from L.A. LIVE, our hotel is convenient to the University of Southern California and Dodger Stadium. Luxury abounds at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE.Marriott

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport
address: 7501 North Glenoaks Boulevard, Burbank, CA 91504
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport is located in the center of everything: the Bob Hope Airport, shopping, dining, and entertainment are all within minutes of the hotel. See one of your favorite game shows or late night talk shows in person. We are proud to have Disney, Universal Studios, NBC, CBS & Fox as our neighbors, in the heart of Burbank. Feel like seeing more? Visit Six Flags Magic Mountain, Disneyland, California Adventure Land or Knott’s Berry Farm Amusement parks for a thrill you and your family will be sure not to forget. Surf on over to the Santa Monica beach and Pier or cruise on over to the Venice Boardwalk for authentic street entertainment. If your into snowboarding or skiing Big Bear lake, Mountain High & Snow Summit are only hours away! Whether you're surfing the web or checking your e-mail, take advantage of our complimentary high-speed Internet access in our guest rooms and lobby area to save you time and money. Our guest rooms come equipped with a large work desk equipped and an ergonomic chair and a data port for wired connectivity. Feel like relaxing on the bed and working? Our Cloud Nine bed does away with the old-fashioned bedspread, featuring instead a, white duvet cover, enveloping a lofty white comforter. The bed features four pillows providing consumers a choice in firmness (some filled with soft down, some with firmer foam), a lumbar pillow in a soothing color that provides guests back support if they choose to read, watch television or enjoy the Hampton lap desk and work wirelessly while resting in bed. Relax and unwind with an in-room movie or take advantage of our heated pool and spa. Working through the night and need a late night energy boost? Purchase a light snack or drink from our convenient suite shop located in lobby. And don't forget about the complimentary On the House hot breakfast in the morning. Our new utensils, made from 100% renewable resources, will help you reduce your carbon footprint, one step at a time, and feed your hunger all in a days work. In a hurry? Grab one of our On The Run Breakfast Bags with over 20 different items to start each day off right. Before you start your day, don't forget to grab a complimentary cup of coffee/tea or pick-up a copy of the latest USA Today in the lobby each morning. We also provide complimentary parking and shuttle service to the Burbank Airport. Every stay with the Hampton Inn & Suites Burbank Airport offers you additional points and miles for your travel, so sign up for your Hilton HHonors loyalty program today! Our unconditional 100% Hampton Guarantee ensures our travelers complete satisfaction. Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you are not completely satisfied, we don't expect you to pay. That's our commitment and your guarantee. That's 100% HamptonHilton

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 901 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience space with modern conveniences in the City of Angels at Residence Inn Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Our dual-branded hotel near Oakland places you in the heart of the downtown district, across from the renowned Los Angeles Convention Center and next to the L.A. LIVE Campus. See a game at the nearby Crypto.com Arena (formerly Staples Center), or go to a concert at the Microsoft Theater, home to the Emmys and the American Music Awards. Back at our hotel, discover extended-stay, apartment-style living with valet parking and free Wi-Fi. Start each day with a complimentary hot breakfast and end with bistro-style cuisine at our hotel restaurant, Table 901. Soak up the California sunshine as you unwind by our third-floor rooftop pool. Each one of our 219 pet-friendly hotel suites showcases a full kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a well-lit work desk and stunning views of downtown L.A.Marriott
